message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start negotiations.  What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. Can we meet in the middle?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you're serious about this product.  While $9,500 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $12,500.  It's a generous offer considering the value you'll get out of it.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10,000 for the product. Can we make a deal?
